name: metric-estimate-fwhm
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Estimate fwhm smoothness of a metric file.

Estimates the smoothness of the metric columns, printing the estimates to standard output.  These estimates ignore variation in vertex spacing.

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: the surface to use for distance and neighbor information

inputs.name: opt_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: use only data within an ROI: the metric file to use as an ROI

inputs.name: opt_column_column
inputs.description: select a single column to estimate smoothness of: the column number or name

inputs.name: opt_whole_file
inputs.description: estimate for the whole file at once, not each column separately

inputs.name: opt_demean
inputs.description: subtract the mean image before estimating smoothness
